tradux.description_meta: Automate multilingual content with a developer-friendly translation library powered by AI and Cloudflare Workers.
tradux.keywords_meta: Tradux, translation library, multilingual content, Cloudflare Workers, AI-powered translations, language models, i18n, localization, developer tools
tradux.extraInfoServerUtility: Tradux works with Node.js for backend translations and can set the meta tags of your website according to the current language.

hero.title: Tradux - Intelligent Translation Library
hero.description: Developer-friendly translation library that automates the process of managing multilingual content in your projects. It seamlessly integrates with Cloudflare Workers to provide AI-powered translations using language models.

callToAction.title: Start Using Tradux Today
callToAction.description: Empower your apps with seamless multilingual support using Tradux.

seoInternationalization.title: SEO & Internationalization: Dynamic Meta Tags
seoInternationalization.description: Tradux makes it easy to dynamically update meta tags such as <html lang="..."> and <title> based on the user's selected language.
seoInternationalization.details: You can update meta tags dynamically in client-side apps (React, Vue, Svelte, Vanilla JS) using JavaScript, or on the server using SSR (Server-Side Rendering) with frameworks like Express, Vite SSR or AstroJS.

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.description: Tradux solves the common problem of managing translations in modern applications by:

intelligent.title: Providing intelligent updates
intelligent.description: Sync translations when your base language changes

consistency.title: Maintaining consistency
consistency.description: Ensures all languages stay in sync with your default language

autoSync.title: Auto-syncing config
autoSync.description: Automatically updates availableLanguages when files are added/removed

aiPowered.title: AI-Powered Translations via Cloudflare Workers API

smartUpdate.title: Smart Update System
smartUpdate.description: Only translates missing content, preserves existing translations

autoConfig.title: Auto Config Management
autoConfig.description: Automatically syncs availableLanguages with actual files

frameworkAgnostic.title: Framework Agnostic
frameworkAgnostic.description: Works with React, Vue, Vanilla JS, Node.js, and more

intelligentPath.title: Intelligent Path Resolution
intelligentPath.description: Automatically finds i18n folders in public directories

extraStepNotice.title: Extra Step Required
extraStepNotice.description: requires running the init command to properly set up Tradux in your project.

configuration.title: Configuration
configuration.description: After installation, Tradux automatically creates a tradux.config.json file:

options.title: Configuration Options:
options.availableLanguages: Auto-managed list of available language files

commands.all:
# Update all existing languages
npx tradux -u
commands.specific:
# Update specific languages
npx tradux -u es,pt

# Remove specific languages
npx tradux -r es,pt

updateVsTranslate.title: Update vs Translate:
updateVsTranslate.description: Update (-u) syncs existing language files with your default language, adding missing content and removing obsolete keys. Translate (-t) creates new translation files. Remove (-r) deletes language files and automatically updates the config.

javascriptApi.title: JavaScript API
javascriptApi.importDescription: Import Tradux functions in your application:

features.useFor: Use for: Language switchers, user preferences

features.returns: Returns the currently active language code as a string
features.useFor: Use for: Displaying current language, conditional logic

features.returns: Returns array of available language codes from config
features.useFor: Use for: Building language selectors, validation
